content: in this legal case the district court in ljubljana made a decision regarding the division of assets among three heirs a widow a son and a daughter the assets include two real estate properties a car and unpaid pension benefits the widow will have the right to enjoy the real estate properties for her lifetime as well as the car and unpaid pension benefits the son and daughter will each receive half of the two real estate properties the court ruled based on the inheritance act specifically article 11 the court fees amounted to 756 eur which were divided between the two heirs the procedure lasted for 10 months and 25 days the court decision was made on december 8 2021 an appeal can be lodged within 15 days of receiving the written decision and it must be filed with the appropriate court the ljubljana high court will handle the appeal the appeal should clearly state the order being appealed and whether it is being challenged in whole or in part the appeal must be signed by the appellant and accompanied by the necessary court fee

metadata.subject_of_succession: real estate, car, unpaid pension benefits
